reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and flatters various body types, with one noting the lace length and sleeves create an appropriate mother-of-the-bride look. The dress is comfortable for dancing all night, made of thick stretchy material, and offers good value for money. While some customers find the sizing accurate, others report sizing issues. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Dress That Looks Way More Expensive Than It Is!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress was amazing! I wore it to a wedding and got tons of compliments. For reference, Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ and 140 lbs and ordered a Medium in Navy â€” it fit great. I did need to hem it a little, but didnâ€™t have time, and it still looked beautiful. Super comfortable and flattering all night. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Charlie S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress. Classy look, not too much , not too little.
items.body: This dress is so cute and comfortable to wear. Quality material is used. It's stretchy, but not too stretchy to cause that cheap look. The lace isn't itchy either! Professionally made and well sewn. I love the classy blue color. The cons are the dress length and the weird sizing chart that led me to by the wrong larger size XXL. I never wear XXL, but I took the chance based on the chart. You can see what I mean: My bust is 42, waist is 39 and hips 45. I had to return the dress for a smaller XL size. Now that I have the right size, it's still too long by about 2 inches with my 3 inch heels. That's a lot! Because I can sew, I'm hemming it myself. Not hard for me. For this reason, I won't reduce a star. I like this dress that much. Hemming it is an easy fix, making the dress perfect. I can dress it up with accessories, great hair and makeup, and make it pop! I'm 5'2" and 178 lbs. On the attached pics, the hem is only pinned and the dress is not iron yet. I hope this helps! Read more
items.author: ChickyD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, flattering dress with some stretch
items.body: I bought this dress for a black tie dinner event. This dress was flattering, and medium fit me well with some smoothing shapewear underneath. I am 5ft 0in, around 140lbs, and not fit. I originally thought the waist was a little too tight when I tried this dress on without shapewear, but the large was too loose and a bit too long. Given my height, I was surprised that the length was OK. I wore heels that were 2.5-3 inches, and the bottom of the dress swept the floor a tiny but, but not enough to trip me. The material looks nice, feels durable, and it has some stretch (except in the band around the waist.) The navy color was pretty. The zipper sticks where the material changes, but not so much that I couldn't zip and unzip by myself while pulling the top or bottom a bit to straighten it out. I was sitting, standing, and walking while wearing this dress, and I think if I was dancing, it could have stretched the top of the slit apart enough to tear, but I can't know that for sure without trying it. Overall I really liked how this dress looked on me and definitely plan to wear it again. I will shop this brand again when I need formal or semiformal dresses such as for weddings and business events. Read more
items.author: Carmen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars As Described
items.body: I gave this a four star because it is what it says it is. The measurements are correct. The problem is that the measurements they have I did not fit in either size large or the extra large. The dress itself looks nice. The lace is soft and has plenty of room without being too roomy in the arms. The skirt part is made out of a heavy kind of material that doesnâ€™t really feel like polyester. The fabric is not stretchy. The dress will not cling to your curves nor will it form to your body. No give for bulges. The V neckline is not as low as I feared. The color was spot on. A very cute dress for the right body type. Read more
items.author: MEileen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vintage elegant mother of bride/groom dress
items.body: I wore this dress to my sonâ€™s vintage style barn wedding and it was perfect! It was surprisingly comfortable and flattering to wear. I paired it with a navy fascinator and navy lace shoes that I found on Amazon. It was a classic elegant look for a reasonable price. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: David Kantlehner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best stitching. Color is very off.
items.body: I loved this dress. It fit beautifully. I bought it for my husband's work party next weekend. While I was hanging it up, I noticed some loose stitching in a spot on the waistband. Then after further inspection, there were 3 spots where the stitching was out. So there are 3 holes. I attached pictures. I'm returning it and ordering another one. I'm hoping the next one will be better. I may message the seller too. Also the color is way off. The last picture is from the site. It looks more purple. The pictures I posted look more red. Fabric is stretchy, and the color is pretty, even though it's no where near the color in the Amazon photos. I'm 5'10", 160 lbs, 40D. Read more
items.author: Lisa J Fisk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning on a budget!
items.body: Beautiful dress, fit true to size. The fabric and quality are very good. The cut is flattering, and the detail was very nice. I ordered this as a grandmother of the bride dress, for my mother in law. She looked beautiful! this dress is stunning. Read more
items.author: Christina

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress - Horrible condition
items.body: The dress itself is beautiful in design, but the one I received clearly lacked proper inspection. The tag was attached with a safety pin, the lace around the sleeves and lower area showed visible wear and lint, and worst of all, there was a strong body odor under the arms. I had to wash it several times before wearing it. I chose not to return it only because my event was just days away, but this experience was very disappointing. Please improve quality control and ensure items are properly cleaned before shipping. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Burgundy, B-black, B-maroon, Black, B-purple, Navy Blue, B-navy Blue, Dark Green, B-cinnamon Pink, Pink, Purple, Cinnamon Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
